channel.description: Recent content in üè¢ Rensselaer Polytechnic Institute on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: A Primal-Dual-Assisted Penalty Approach to Bilevel Optimization with Coupled Constraints
item.description: BLOCC, a novel first-order algorithm, efficiently solves bilevel optimization problems with coupled constraints, offering improved scalability and convergence for machine learning applications.

item.title: Linear Causal Bandits: Unknown Graph and Soft Interventions
item.description: Causal bandits with unknown graphs and soft interventions are solved by establishing novel upper and lower regret bounds, plus a computationally efficient algorithm.
